title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, April 23, 2021
description: William Shakespere is believed to have been born on this day in 1564. He gave us the phrases "dead as a doornail," "come what may," "heart's content,” and "wild goose chase."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: William Shakespere is believed to have been born on this day in 1564. He gave us the phrases "dead as a doornail," "come what may," "heart's content,” and "wild goose chase."
